attributes.name: selected
attributes.description: Currently selected menu tab

attributes.name: listType
attributes.description:
Changes information density of list items.
By default it uses material's list item with two lines (72px height)
Possible values are:

- `default` or empty - regular list view
- `comfortable` - enables MD single line list item vie (52px height)
- `compact` - enables list that has 40px height (touch recommended)

attributes.name: compatibility
attributes.description: Enables compatibility with Anypoint platform

attributes.name: history
attributes.description:
If set the history menu is rendered. This comes from the application
settings and is different from `noHistory` which is intended to
temporarily remove the history from the view (for menu popup option)

attributes.name: hideHistory
attributes.description: When set it hides history from the view

attributes.name: hideSaved
attributes.description: When set it hides saved list from the view

attributes.name: hideProjects
attributes.description: When set it hides projects from the view

attributes.name: hideApis
attributes.description: When set it hides APIs list from the view

attributes.name: popup
attributes.description: Renders popup menu buttons when this property is set.

attributes.name: dataTransfer
attributes.description:
Adds draggable property to the request list item element.
The `dataTransfer` object has `arc/request-object` mime type with
serialized JSON with request model.

attributes.name: dragOpenTimeout
attributes.description:
A timeout after which the project item is opened when dragging a
request over.

attributes.name: minimized
attributes.description: When set only the navigation rail is rendered.

properties.name: selected
properties.description: Currently selected menu tab

properties.name: listType
properties.description:
Changes information density of list items.
By default it uses material's list item with two lines (72px height)
Possible values are:

- `default` or empty - regular list view
- `comfortable` - enables MD single line list item vie (52px height)
- `compact` - enables list that has 40px height (touch recommended)

properties.name: compatibility
properties.description: Enables compatibility with Anypoint platform

properties.name: history
properties.description:
If set the history menu is rendered. This comes from the application
settings and is different from `noHistory` which is intended to
temporarily remove the history from the view (for menu popup option)

properties.name: hideHistory
properties.description: When set it hides history from the view

properties.name: hideSaved
properties.description: When set it hides saved list from the view

properties.name: hideProjects
properties.description: When set it hides projects from the view

properties.name: hideApis
properties.description: When set it hides APIs list from the view

properties.name: popup
properties.description: Renders popup menu buttons when this property is set.

properties.name: dataTransfer
properties.description:
Adds draggable property to the request list item element.
The `dataTransfer` object has `arc/request-object` mime type with
serialized JSON with request model.

properties.name: dragOpenTimeout
properties.description:
A timeout after which the project item is opened when dragging a
request over.

properties.name: exportOptionsOpened
properties.description: Indicates that the export options panel is currently rendered.

properties.name: deleteAllDialogOpened
properties.description: Indicates that the delete all data dialog is currently rendered.

properties.name: minimized
properties.description: When set only the navigation rail is rendered.

events.name: minimized
events.description: When the `minimized` property change through internal interaction

tags.name: history-menu
tags.description: Advanced REST Client's history menu element.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description:
Requests list type. Can be one of:
- saved
- history
- project

Depending on the the type request change event is handled differently.
For saved and history requests corresponding type is processed.
For project requests list only request that has project id in the
projects list is processed.

This property must be set.

attributes.name: projectId
attributes.description:
Project datastore ID to display.
This should be set only when type is `project`

attributes.name: isSearch
attributes.description:
When set this component is in search mode.
This means that the list won't be loaded automatically and
some operations not related to search are disabled.

attributes.name: noAuto
attributes.description: When set it won't query for data automatically when attached to the DOM.

attributes.name: detailedSearch
attributes.description: When set the datastore query is performed with `detailed` option

attributes.name: draggableEnabled
attributes.description:
Adds draggable property to the request list item element.
The `dataTransfer` object has `arc/request-object` mime type with
serialized JSON with request model.

attributes.name: selectable
attributes.description: When set the selection controls are rendered

attributes.name: listType
attributes.description:
Changes information density of list items.
By default it uses material's list item with two lines (72px height)
Possible values are:

- `default` or empty - regular list view
- `comfortable` - enables MD single line list item vie (52px height)
- `compact` - enables list that has 40px height (touch recommended)

attributes.name: listActions
attributes.description: When set it adds action buttons into the list elements.

attributes.name: pageLimit
attributes.description: Single page query limit.

attributes.name: compatibility
attributes.description: Enables compatibility with Anypoint platform

properties.name: requests
properties.description:
The list of request to render.
It can be either saved, history or project items.

properties.name: type
properties.description:
Requests list type. Can be one of:
- saved
- history
- project

Depending on the the type request change event is handled differently.
For saved and history requests corresponding type is processed.
For project requests list only request that has project id in the
projects list is processed.

This property must be set.

properties.name: projectId
properties.description:
Project datastore ID to display.
This should be set only when type is `project`

properties.name: project
properties.description:
A project object associated with requests.
This is only valid when `type` is set to `project`. It is set automatically
when `readProjectRequests()` is called.

properties.name: isSearch
properties.description:
When set this component is in search mode.
This means that the list won't be loaded automatically and
some operations not related to search are disabled.

properties.name: noAuto
properties.description: When set it won't query for data automatically when attached to the DOM.

properties.name: detailedSearch
properties.description: When set the datastore query is performed with `detailed` option

properties.name: draggableEnabled
properties.description:
Adds draggable property to the request list item element.
The `dataTransfer` object has `arc/request-object` mime type with
serialized JSON with request model.

properties.name: selectedItems
properties.description: List of selected requests' ids. It returns null when the `selectable` is not set.

properties.name: selectable
properties.description: When set the selection controls are rendered

properties.name: hasRequests
properties.description: Computed value, true when the project has requests.

properties.name: dataUnavailable
properties.description: True when there's no requests after refreshing the state.

properties.name: searchListEmpty
properties.description:
Computed value. True when the query has been performed and no items
has been returned. It is different from `listHidden` where less
conditions has to be checked. It is set to true when it doesn't
have items, is not loading and is search.

properties.name: listType
properties.description:
Changes information density of list items.
By default it uses material's list item with two lines (72px height)
Possible values are:

- `default` or empty - regular list view
- `comfortable` - enables MD single line list item vie (52px height)
- `compact` - enables list that has 40px height (touch recommended)

properties.name: listActions
properties.description: When set it adds action buttons into the list elements.

properties.name: pageLimit
properties.description: Single page query limit.

properties.name: compatibility
properties.description: Enables compatibility with Anypoint platform

properties.name: hasTwoLines
properties.description: True if the list item should be consisted of two lines of description.

properties.name: querying
properties.description: True when the element is querying the database for the data.

events.name: details
events.description: When the request details were requested

tags.description: A list of projects in the ARC main menu.

Computed value. True when the query has been performed and no items

properties.description:

When set the element won't request projects list when attached to the dom.

properties.name: items
properties.description:
The list of request to render.
It can be either saved, history or project items.

properties.name: noAuto
properties.description: When set it won't query for data automatically when attached to the DOM.

properties.name: hasItems
properties.description: Computed value. `true` if the `items` property has values.

properties.name: dataUnavailable
properties.description: True when there's no requests after refreshing the state.

properties.name: listType
properties.description:
Changes information density of list items.
By default it uses material's list item with two lines (72px height)
Possible values are:

- `default` or empty - regular list view
- `comfortable` - enables MD single line list item vie (52px height)
- `compact` - enables list that has 40px height (touch recommended)

properties.name: listActions
properties.description: When set it adds action buttons into the list elements.

properties.name: pageLimit
properties.description: Single page query limit.

properties.name: compatibility
properties.description: Enables compatibility with Anypoint platform

properties.name: hasTwoLines
properties.description: True if the list item should be consisted of two lines of description.

properties.name: querying
properties.description: True when the element is querying the database for the data.
